definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: Cofie then had a goal disallowed on 35 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡35分鐘時的一個進球又被剝奪。

sentences.english: Despite Spain passing well, they weren’t creating a great amount of chances.
sentences.chinese: 儘管西班牙傳球精妙，他們也沒有製造太多進球機會。

sentences.english: "I'm sure that the goal is useful for him, " Lucarelli concluded.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲這個進球對穆里尼奧有用。

sentences.english: And then Grosso's goal in the 119th minute.
sentences.chinese: 結果格羅索在119分鐘進球了。

sentences.english: The former Danubio youngster then reflected on his goal against Juventus.
sentences.chinese: 這位前達努比奧的年輕人談到了對尤文時攻入的進球。

sentences.english: He was so strong when he burst into the area and scored so many goals.
sentences.chinese: 當他突入禁區的時候他是那麼強大，射入那麼多進球。

sentences.english: My goal against Modena is now a distant memory.
sentences.chinese: 我對莫德納的進球已經是太過遙遠的記憶了。

sentences.english: Avoid stepping on adversary's ball and altering competitor's line of putt.
sentences.chinese: 在果嶺是應避免踏越對方球員的球，及進球路線。

sentences.english: The good thing at the moment is that anyone can score for us.
sentences.chinese: 最爽的是球隊裏幾乎每個人都能進球。

sentences.english: He is joint tournament top scorer with three goals.
sentences.chinese: 他現在以三個進球領先該盃賽射手榜。

sentences.english: The referee called the goal illegal.
sentences.chinese: 裁判員判定該進球無效。

sentences.english: The team's efforts to score were frustrated by the opposing goalkeeper.
sentences.chinese: 該隊想要進球的努力被對方的守門員挫敗了。

sentences.english: Eto 'o's goal just Pobai but missed the first accident.
sentences.chinese: 剛剛進球破百的埃託奧卻意外無緣首發。

sentences.english: Asamoah Gyan scored Ghana's crucial second goal.
sentences.chinese: 加納隊的吉安踢進了關鍵的第二個進球。

sentences.english: We are trying game after game to improve our play and to score goals.
sentences.chinese: 每場比賽我們都會嘗試提高自己，取得進球。

sentences.english: It was Maldini's first goal of the season.
sentences.chinese: 這是馬爾蒂尼本賽季的第一個進球。

definition: to deal the fatal blow (sports, chess etc)/to score the winning point
Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
competition schedule/the course of a race
to break the rules/an illegality/a foul
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
to face off against one's adversary (military, sports etc)
